name: trustlines-netstats.dnp.dappnode.eth
description:
The netstats client reports the state of your node to the [netstats page](https://netstats.tlbc.trustlines.foundation/) that gives a rough overview of the current network state.
It is an optional component which helps the community by providing information on your running node to a central server.
To participate, you first need to request credentials managed by the Trustlines Foundation.
Please email `netstats@trustlines.foundation` to do so.
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)
